group_1.textRight: Playtime's over!
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround:3052A02]Yaaaaaaaaah!!!

group_1.textCenter: Hmm... That was a bit too close for comfort.

group_1.textRight: Woof!
It caught me off guard with how strong it@was, but it was still easy peasy!

group_1.textLeft: That's great... I'm so happy you're all@right!
Thanks again for fighting in my place!

group_1.textRight: No worries! Glad to help!

group_1.textLeft: Um... Miss? Did you come here from another@country?

group_1.textRight: Yep! I'm from California. You know, in the@United States.
I'm studying abroad here!

group_1.textLeft: Studying abroad... Wait, did you come to@Japan all by yourself?

group_1.textRight: Yep! I just got here the other day!
I just checked out the tech district looking@for kawaii stuff today.
And tomorrow, I'm planning to go around the@rest of Kamihama City!

group_1.textLeft: Th-then, I can show you around if you like!

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: I want to thank you somehow...

group_1.textRight: Oh, that would be amazing!
I'm Ashley Taylor! Nice to meetcha!

group_1.textLeft: This is my Shiba Inu, Mameji.
It's lovely to meet you, Ashley.

group_1.textRight: Riko and Mameji... You sure are a cute duo!@All the way down to your names!

group_1.textLeft: What kind of places would you like to see,@Ashley?

group_1.textRight: I'm good with anywhere, so long as there's@lots of cute stuff wherever we go!
I wanna take videos of all the kawaii stuff in @Japan.
I'm gonna post 'em online so everyone back@home can see 'em!
I was gonna check out Sakae Ward tomorrow.
Know where I can get my kawaii fix there?

group_1.textLeft: There were these girls who came to the shop@the other day...
They were talking about this shop that sells@really quirky, cute items there.

group_1.textRight: *Gasp* Quirky AND kawaii!
I gotta go there!

group_1.textLeft: Okay! I'll look up how to get there for@tomorrow!
